  • Method Details

    • getCollectionAdvancedIslandGroup

      public static List<IslandGroup> getCollectionAdvancedIslandGroup(AdvancedParameterHandler advancedParameters, ParameterHandler parameters, int startingId, int amount)
      Creates and returns a List of AdvancedIslands
      Parameters:
      startingId - Starting id for the IslandGroups
      amount - Amount of IslandGroups to have in the collection. if the amount is 1, the next and previous pointers will refer to the single island group in the collection
      Returns:
      a collection of AdvancedIslandGroup

    • getCollectionAdvancedIslandGroup

      public static List<IslandGroup> getCollectionAdvancedIslandGroup(AdvancedParameterHandler advancedParameters, ParameterHandler parameters, int startingId, int amount, VirtualView virtualView)

      Parameters:

      amount - Amount of IslandGroups to have in the collection. if the amount is 1, the next and previous pointers will refer to the single island group in the collection
      Returns:
      a collection of AdvancedIslandGroup

    • mergeAdjacent

      public IslandGroup mergeAdjacent(int newId, List<IslandGroup> islandGroups) throws UnmergeableException
      Merges this islandGroup with the neighboring islands and updates the IslandGroup collection in game
      Overrides:
      mergeAdjacent in class IslandGroup
      Parameters:
      newId - the id to assign the newly formed group
      islandGroups - the islandGroup list that the new island will need to check for possible mergings
      Returns:
      the new islandGroup created by the merging
      Throws:
      UnmergeableException - The island group can't be merged with any neighbors

    • toBean

      public GameElementBean toBean()
      Overrides:
      toBean in class IslandGroup
      Returns:
      a Java Bean with all information about this Island group, its id, islands' ids, students on this island group, if MN is present, tower color and num of block tiles on this island group
